products.title: Product
lampshade: Decorative lamps made from rattan, bamboo, wood, or seagrass, providing a warm, natural ambiance
chairBenchPapasan: Relaxing chairs, benches, or Papasan chairs (round, cozy design), perfect for a comfortable living space
table: Tables crafted from wood, rattan, or other natural materials, ideal as coffee tables or work desks
cabinetShelfMirror: Multi-functional cabinets, shelves, or decorative mirrors with rattan or wooden frames
decorationRugWallDecor: Natural material rugs, wall decor, or other aesthetic items for home styling
petBed: Pet beds woven from water hyacinth or rattan, providing comfort and a stylish look
tableware: Cutlery, plates, bowls, cups, and napkin rings made of ceramics, wood, or bamboo
Functional yet decorative for dining experiences.
kitchenware: Basket: Baskets for bread, fruits, or other food items
Utensil Holder: Bamboo or rattan holders for chopsticks, spoons, and forks.
Coasters: Protects table surfaces from heat or moisture.
Fruit Platter: Wooden or rattan platters for serving fresh fruits.
Fruit Platter: Wooden or rattan platters for serving fresh fruits.
Wooden Cutting Board: Used for food preparation.
Spice Containers: Storage jars for salt, pepper, or cooking oil.
Serving Trays: Wooden trays for serving dishes or setting the table.
picnicBasket: Compact baskets for carrying food and essentials during outdoor activities
vase: Decorative vases made of ceramics, wood, or rattan for floral arrangements
planter: Pots for flowers or plants, often made of rattan or wood
sunlounger: Outdoor lounge chairs for sunbathing, with wooden frames or woven designs
giftboxStorageBoxes: Unique, eco-friendly gift boxes made from natural materials
fashionBags: Handcrafted bags made from seagrass, rattan, or bamboo, suitable as gifts or fashion accessories
handcraftedJewelry: Bracelets or necklaces made from bamboo, rattan, or wood
laundryBasket: Woven baskets made from rattan or water hyacinth for storing dirty laundry or clothing
bathSponge: Natural sponges made from plant fibers, safe and eco-friendly for skincare
shelves: Bamboo or rattan shelves for organizing towels and toiletries
soapHolder: Soap dishes made from bamboo or wood, practical and aesthetic

ourExport.title: Our Export
ourExport.slogan: Handi&Co: Handmade with Care, Eco for Life. Your go-to partner for premium Vietnamese agricultural exports
ourExport.description: With over a decade of specialized experience in Europe, Asia, and the Middle East, Handi&Co stands as a trusted expert in delivering top-quality Vietnamese agricultural products. Our dedicated team is committed to ensuring flawless, on-time deliveries to every corner of the globe

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.slogan: It's all about what we love the most...
ourStory.description: For the passion of spreading the beauty of Vietnamese nature to the whole world, Handi & Eco intends to becoming one of the leading companies in Vietnam who is specialized in producing and supplying home decorative products that made from natural materials such as seagrass, waterhyacinth, rattan, bamboo, fern, palm leaf, maize … we have our own designer team who has been educated in USA. We offer OEM service and willing to develop customerâ€™s own design. Our factory is located in traditional village in Ninh Binh province, where is very famous for handicraft products. We have over 1000 home workers , who has many years of experience in making handmade home decoration products.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.description: At Handi&Eco, our mission is to bring the timeless beauty of handcrafted bamboo and rattan products into modern living, while contributing to a sustainable future. Rooted in the traditions of skilled artisans and inspired by the harmony of nature, we create eco-friendly solutions that seamlessly blend with contemporary lifestyles.
